original_text: They set aside the burnt offerings to give them to the subdivisions of the families of the people to offer to the Lord, as it is written in the Book of Moses. They did the same with the cattle.
korean_text: 그 번제물을 옮겨 족속의 서열대로 모든 백성에게 나누어 모세의 책에 기록된 대로 여호와께 드리게 하고 소도 그와 같이 하고

sentences.original_text: They set aside the burnt offerings
to give them to the subdivisions of the families of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성 가문들의 각 분파에게 주기 위해

sentences.original_text: as it is written in the Book of Moses
They did the same with the cattle
